title: Fundamentals of Convolutional Coding, 2nd Edition (DjShay12).pdf
description:
ISBN:	978-0-470-27683-9
Year:	2015
Pages:	688
Language:	English
File size:	3.8 MB
File format:	PDF

===============================

Fundamentals of Convolutional Coding, Second Edition, regarded as a bible of convolutional coding brings you a clear and comprehensive discussion of the basic principles of this field.

Two new chapters on low-density parity-check (LDPC) convolutional codes and iterative coding; Viterbi, BCJR, BEAST, list, and sequential decoding of convolutional codes; Distance properties of convolutional codes; Includes a downloadable solutions manual
